Uses of Class
simplenlg.framework.InflectedWordElement

  • Packages that use InflectedWordElement 
    Package Description
    simplenlg.morphology.english
    This package contains the necessary classes for running the morphology processor for the English language.

    • Uses of InflectedWordElement in simplenlg.morphology.english

      Methods in simplenlg.morphology.english with parameters of type InflectedWordElement 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static NLGElement MorphologyRules.doAdjectiveMorphology(InflectedWordElement element, WordElement baseWord)
      This method performs the morphology for adjectives.
      static NLGElement MorphologyRules.doAdverbMorphology(InflectedWordElement element, WordElement baseWord)
      This method performs the morphology for adverbs.
      static NLGElement MorphologyRules.doPronounMorphology(InflectedWordElement element)
      This method performs the morphology for pronouns.
